mapper.select: SELECT NO, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_NAME, B_CHECK, B_JOINDATE, B_UPDATEDATE, B_KATENAME, B_PUB FROM BOARD_INFO WHERE NO = #{no}
SELECT NO, B_TITLE, B_NAME, B_CHECK, B_JOINDATE FROM BOARD_INFO ORDER BY NO DESC LIMIT #{start},10

choose.when: WHERE b.B_NAME = u.U_ID AND (b_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR b_content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR b_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_INFO (B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_NAME) VALUES (#{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_name})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_INFO SET (B_TITLE = #{b_title}, B_CONTENT = #{b_content}, B_UPDATEDATE = now())
